name: The 2025 16th International Conference on E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning (IC4E 2025)
content: Conference Proceedings: IC4E welcomes the submissions from on innovative work from researchers in work from researchers in academic, industry and government describing original research work in E-Education, E-Business, E-Management and E-Learning. Accepted excellent papers by IC4E 2025 will be published in the conference proccedings, which will be collected in the conference proceedings, and then indexed by Ei Compendex, and Scopus, etc. major databases. Journal Publication: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2021: 1.3), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) Frequency: Monthly DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Template: http://www.ijiet.org/files/IJIET\_template.doc
organizers: Beijing Spring Institute of Education Technology, China
